attributes.action: Stop the Spouse visa wage threshold going to £38,700 from £18,400.
attributes.additional_details:
This is discriminatory towards all people married to nationalities requiring a spouse visa. 
People expect to support their spouse but the government are going to split families. 
A basic human right - living with your spouse.
attributes.background: The current wage threshold for someone sponsoring their spouse is £18400 the government have just announced they will put it to £38,700. The national median wage is £34,963.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
